pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hosmer-Lemeshow Test for Binary and Multinomial Logistic Models // Contains a sole function that performs the Hosmer-Lemeshow test for binary and multinomial logistic regression models. It implements the classic Hosmer-Lemeshow test as well as its multinomial generalisation, both of which are described in Hosmer, Lemeshow and Sturdivant (2013).
